statements.delete: if exists (select 1 from PSP_Line_Info where Uid=#SUID#) DELETE FROM PSP_Line_Info WHERE Uid=#SUID# if exists (select 1 from LineInfo where Uid=#SUID#) DELETE FROM LineInfo WHERE Uid=#SUID# DELETE FROM PSPDEV WHERE SUID = #SUID#

Declare @uid nvarchar(100) set @uid=(select "SUID" from PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# and EleID=#EleID#) DELETE FROM LineInfo WHERE UID=@uid DELETE FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# and EleID=#EleID#
statements.update:
UPDATE PSPDEV SET "Number" = #Number#, "Name" = #Name#, "X1" = #X1#, "Y1" = #Y1#, "X2" = #X2#, "Y2" = #Y2#, "SvgUID" = #SvgUID#, "FirstNode" = #FirstNode#, "LastNode" = #LastNode#, "EleID" = #EleID#, "Type" = #Type#, "OutP" = #OutP#, "OutQ" = #OutQ#, "InPutP" = #InPutP#, "InPutQ" = #InPutQ#, "VoltR" = #VoltR#, "VoltV" = #VoltV#, "LineR" = #LineR#, "LineTQ" = #LineTQ#, "LineGNDC" = #LineGNDC#, "LineChange" = #LineChange#, "Flag" = #Flag#, "NodeType" = #NodeType#, "Burthen" = #Burthen#, "LineLength"=#LineLength#, "LineLevel"=#LineLevel#, "LineType"=#LineType#, "LineStatus"=#LineStatus#, "VoltCapacity"=#VoltCapacity#, "PowerFactor"=#PowerFactor#, "StandardVolt"=#StandardVolt#, "StandardCurrent"=#StandardCurrent#, "PositiveR"=#PositiveR#, "PositiveTQ"=#PositiveTQ#, "ZeroR"=#ZeroR#, "ZeroTQ"=#ZeroTQ#, "BigTQ"=#BigTQ#, "SmallTQ"=#SmallTQ#, "HuganLine1"=#HuganLine1#, "HuganLine2"=#HuganLine2#, "HuganLine3"=#HuganLine3#, "HuganLine4"=#HuganLine4#, "HuganTQ1"=#HuganTQ1#, "HuganTQ2"=#HuganTQ2#, "HuganTQ3"=#HuganTQ3#, "HuganTQ4"=#HuganTQ4#, "HuganTQ5"=#HuganTQ5#, "HuganFirst"=#HuganFirst#, "Lable"=#Lable#, "BigP"=#BigP#, "K"=#K#, "G"=#G#, "KName"=#KName#, "KSwitchStatus"=#KSwitchStatus#, "ReferenceVolt" = #ReferenceVolt#, "P0" = #P0#, "I0" = #I0#, "SiN" = #SiN#, "SjN" = #SjN#, "SkN" = #SkN#, "iV" = #iV#, "jV" = #jV#, "kV" = #kV#, "Pij" = #Pij#, "Pjk" = #Pjk#, "Pik" = #Pik#, "Vij" = #Vij#, "Vjk" = #Vjk#, "Vik" = #Vik#, "Vipos" = #Vipos#, "Vistep" = #Vistep#, "Vimax" = #Vimax#, "Vimin" = #Vimin#, "Vjpos" = #Vjpos#, "Vjstep" = #Vjstep#, "Vjmax" = #Vjmax#, "Vjmin" = #Vjmin#, "Vkpos" = #Vkpos#, "Vkstep" = #Vkstep#, "Vkmax" = #Vkmax#, "Vkmin" = #Vkmin#, "Vi0" = #Vi0#, "Vj0" = #Vj0#, "Vk0" = #Vk0#, "Vib" = #Vib#, "Vjb" = #Vjb#, "Vkb" = #Vkb#, "UnitFlag" = #UnitFlag#, "RateVolt" = #RateVolt#, "SubstationEleID" = #SubstationEleID#, "SubstationName" = #SubstationName#, "OperationYear" = #OperationYear#, "IName" = #IName#, "JName" = #JName#, "ISwitch" = #ISwitch#, "JSwitch" = #JSwitch#, "ZeroGNDC" = #ZeroGNDC#, "PositiveGNDC" = #PositiveGNDC#, "ProjectID" = #ProjectID#, "LayerID" = #LayerID#, "JXFS" = #JXFS#, "DQ" = #DQ#, "AreaID" = #AreaID#, "LineType2" = #LineType2#, "Length2" = #Length2#, "LLFS" = #LLFS#, "SwitchNum" = #SwitchNum#, "Num1" = #Num1#, "Num2" = #Num2#, "HgFlag"=#HgFlag#, "FactI"=#FactI#, "Date1"=#Date1#, "Date2"=#Date2# WHERE SUID = #SUID#
update lineinfo set "LineName"=#Name#, "Length"=#LineLength#, "LineType"=#LineType#, "Voltage"=#RateVolt#, "LayerID" = #LayerID#, "ObligateField3"=#OperationYear# WHERE UID=#SUID#
update PSP_Line_Info set "AreaID"=#ProjectID#, "Title"=#Name#, "AreaName"=#AreaID#, "L1"=#RateVolt#, "L6"= #OperationYear#, "L4"= #LineType#, "L5"=#LineLength#, "Flag"=#Flag# WHERE UID=#SUID#
UPDATE PSPDEV SET "X1" = #X1#, "Y1" = #Y1#, "X2" = #X2#, "Y2" = #Y2#, "FirstNode" = #FirstNode#, "LastNode" = #LastNode# WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# AND EleID = #EleID#
statements.select: SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SUID = #SUID#

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV $value$

SELECT "SUID", "SvgUID", "Type", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "BigP" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID =#Type#

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineLength", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE Name = #Name# and SvgUID = #SvgUID# and Type = #Type#

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# AND Lable = #Lable# AND Type = #Type# ORDER BY X1,Y1

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# AND LineStatus = #LineStatus# AND Type = #Type#

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# AND KName = #KName#

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# AND ((FirstNode = #FirstNode# AND LastNode = #LastNode#) OR (FirstNode = #LastNode# AND LastNode = #FirstNode#))

SELECT "SUID", "Number", "Name", "X1", "Y1", "X2", "Y2", "SvgUID", "FirstNode", "LastNode", "EleID", "Type", "OutP", "OutQ", "InPutP", "InPutQ", "VoltR", "VoltV", "LineR", "LineTQ", "LineGNDC", "LineChange", "Flag", "NodeType", "Burthen", "LineLength", "LineLevel", "LineType", "LineStatus", "VoltCapacity", "PowerFactor", "StandardVolt", "StandardCurrent", "PositiveR", "PositiveTQ", "ZeroR", "ZeroTQ", "BigTQ", "SmallTQ", "HuganLine1", "HuganLine2", "HuganLine3", "HuganLine4", "HuganTQ1", "HuganTQ2", "HuganTQ3", "HuganTQ4", "HuganTQ5", "HuganFirst", "Lable", "BigP", "K", "G", "KName", "KSwitchStatus", "ReferenceVolt", "P0", "I0", "SiN", "SjN", "SkN", "iV", "jV", "kV", "Pij", "Pjk", "Pik", "Vij", "Vjk", "Vik", "Vipos", "Vistep", "Vimax", "Vimin", "Vjpos", "Vjstep", "Vjmax", "Vjmin", "Vkpos", "Vkstep", "Vkmax", "Vkmin", "Vi0", "Vj0", "Vk0", "Vib", "Vjb", "Vkb", "UnitFlag", "RateVolt", "SubstationEleID", "SubstationName", "OperationYear", "IName", "JName", "ISwitch", "JSwitch", "ZeroGNDC", "PositiveGNDC", "ProjectID", "LayerID", "JXFS", "DQ", "AreaID", "LineType2", "Length2", "LLFS", "SwitchNum", "Num1", "Num2", "HgFlag", "FactI", "Date1", "Date2" FROM PSPDEV WHERE SvgUID in ($SvgUID$) and LineStatus =#LineStatus# order by Name
SELECT AreaID FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b ,PSP_Substation_Info as c WHERE a.Iname=b.Name and b.Type='01' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and b.SvgUID=c.UID and c.S4='公用' and $value$
SELECT a.AreaID FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b ,PSP_Substation_Info as c WHERE a.Iname=b.Name and b.Type='01' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and b.SvgUID=c.UID and c.S4='公用' and $value$
SELECT SUM(LineLength+Length2) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(LineLength) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(Length2) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT RateVolt FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT b.RateVolt FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b ,PSP_Substation_Info as c WHERE a.Iname=b.Name and b.Type='01' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and b.SvgUID=c.UID and c.S4='公用' and $value$
SELECT SUM(SwitchNum) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(Num1) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(b.Flag) FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b WHERE a.SUID=b.AreaID and a.Type='05' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and $value$
SELECT count(*) FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b WHERE a.SUID=b.AreaID and a.Type='05' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and $value$
SELECT b.RateVolt FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b WHERE a.SUID=b.AreaID and a.Type='05' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and $value$
SELECT a.AreaID FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b WHERE a.SUID=b.AreaID and a.Type='05' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and $value$
SELECT SUM(b.Num2) FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b WHERE a.SUID=b.AreaID and a.Type='05' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and $value$
SELECT SUM(c.OutQ) FROM PSP_PowerSubstationInfo as a ,PSPDEV as b, PSPDEV as c WHERE a.UID=b.SvgUID and b.Type='01' and b.Name=c.IName and c.Type='04' and $value$

SELECT DISTINCT a.SUID FROM PSPDEV as a, PSPDEV as b ,PSP_Substation_Info as c WHERE (a.Iname=b.Name or a.Jname=b.name or a.Kname=b.name) and b.Type='01' and a.ProjectID=b.ProjectID and b.SvgUID=c.UID and $value$
SELECT Name from PSPDEV where $value$
SELECT SvgUID from PSPDEV where $value$
SELECT count(*) from PSPDEV a,PSPDEV b,PSP_Substation_Info c where a.Type='09' and a.Iname=b.Name and b.SvgUID=c.UID and $value$
SELECT Sum(cast(a.Burthen as float)) from PSPDEV a,PSPDEV b,PSP_Substation_Info c where a.Type='09' and a.Iname=b.Name and b.SvgUID=c.UID and $value$
SELECT SUM(Num2) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(Flag) FROM PSPDEV WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(a.Flag) FROM pspdev a inner join pspdev b on a.AreaID=b.SUID inner join PSP_Substation_Info c on b.SvgUID=c.UID WHERE $value$
SELECT SUM(a.Num2) FROM pspdev a inner join pspdev b on a.AreaID=b.SUID inner join PSP_Substation_Info c on b.SvgUID=c.UID WHERE $value$
$value$
select b.Name from pspdev a inner join pspdev b on a.Lable=b.SUID and a.type=b.type where $value$
select b.Title from pspdev a inner join psp_substation_info b on a.SvgUID=b.UID where $value$
